把妹.definition: to pick up a girl; to get a girl

把尿.definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates

把屎.definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she defecates

把弄.definition: to play with; to fiddle with

把式.definition: person skilled in a trade; skill

把心放在肚子裡.pinyin: ba3 xin1 fang4 zai4 du4 zi5 li3

把持.definition: to control; to dominate; to monopolize

把控.definition: to control; to be in charge of

把握.definition: to grasp (also fig.); to seize; to hold; assurance; certainty; sure (of the outcome)

把方便當隨便.pinyin: ba3 fang1 bian4 dang4 sui2 bian4
把方便當隨便.definition: to act unappreciatively in response to a kindness

把柄.definition: handle; (fig.) information that can be used against sb

把玩.definition: to turn around in one's hands; to play with; to fiddle with

把總.definition: low-level officer of the army from the Ming to the mid Qing Dynasty

把脈.definition: to feel the pulse; to take sb's pulse

把舵.definition: to hold the rudder; to hold (to take, to be at) the helm; to steer

把門.definition: to stand as a goalkeeper; to keep guard on a gate

把關.definition: to guard a pass; to check on sth

把風.definition: to keep watch (during a clandestine activity); to be on the lookout

把馬子.definition: to pick up a girl; to get a girl
